questions.question: Which of the following is an example of an IoT device?

explanations.a: Correct. A smart thermostat is an IoT device as it connects to the internet and can be monitored remotely. Read here
explanations.b: Incorrect. A paper notebook is not internet-connected.
explanations.c: Incorrect. A marker is not an electronic device.
explanations.d: Incorrect. A mechanical watch has no IoT capabilities.

questions.question: Which component is typically used to connect sensors to the internet?

answers.a: ESP8266 or Arduino with Wi-Fi module

explanations.a: Correct. Microcontrollers like ESP8266 or Arduino with Wi-Fi module send data to the internet. See details
explanations.b: Incorrect. Bluetooth speakers are not used for sensor-to-internet connections.
explanations.c: Incorrect. A USB flash drive stores data locally.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Laser printers are not IoT connectivity devices.

questions.question: Why is a cloud platform used in IoT systems?

answers.a: To store and process IoT data remotely

explanations.a: Correct. Cloud platforms store, process, and make IoT data accessible from anywhere. Read here
explanations.b: Incorrect. Power supply is provided by batteries or adapters.
explanations.c: Incorrect. Sensors are still required for data collection.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Cloud platforms are unrelated to display quality.
